short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screen capture of a banner on a webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to screenshot banners from: 1. The internal Sky Works Development Banner Preview App 2. Google Double Click Dynamic Creative Preview To create a screenshot the whole banner must be visible. Benefits: 1. Multiple banners can be captured at once as separate files 2. Automatic file naming with banner size included Sky Works Digital Team When running banners on Local Server all the elements of the creative need to be situated in a div element with id 'container', e.g.
Canvas Element
Legals
...
Enjoy!
